EmailTemplate.name: TRIW CAT launch TEST
EmailTemplate.subject: WANTED: Young People with BIG Ideas – Challenge Action Team Launch RE-SCHEDULED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Society
Challenge Action Team Launch - Re-Schedule
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
If you haven't signed up already, have no fear, The Challenge Action Team launch is being RE-SCHEDULED to Tuesday 8th Jan!
Challenge Action Teams are a great chance to carry on The Challenge journey and continue making a difference on issues YOU CARE ABOUT!
Want to create your own community event? We'll show you how and give you support - as well as £300 towards your project.
You could start your own social enterprise, raise money for a charity, even put on your own gig!
Boost your CV, add it to your personal statement, develop loads of skills and meet new people
To sign up e-mail: aimee.ling@the-challenge.org!
The event will be held at The Challenge Network HQ, 75 Westminster Bridge Road, SE1 7HS.
This is an opportunity not to be missed!
Where: The Challenge Network HQ, 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London, SE1 7HS
When: Tuesday 8th January
